title: EngineInputGHCSchema
description: Schema document to keep the information of the timetable to be generated by PenalaraGHC.

ghcData.title: GhcData
ghcData.description: Schema of the object that contains the timetable planning data.

periods.title: Periods
periods.description: Weeks or periods with different assignments which contains the timetable.
periods.$comment: If there is not periods defined the engine will created unique period with all days of the timetable.

followedPeriods.title: FollowedPeriods
followedPeriods.description: Indicates whether, the periods or weeks, considered consecutive days the last day of the previous one, with the first of the next.

lastDay.description: End day of the period, the period include it.

frames.title: Frames
frames.description: Tables of Timetable which it contains sections where subject sessions are located.

sections.title: Sections
sections.description: Timetable cells where sesions are localted.

day.description: Day of the week when is located the section.

index.description: Index inside the day where is located the section.

duration.description: Indicates the (real or proporcional) duration of the section in minutes.
duration.$comment: Indicates the duration of the section that the engine will use to assign sessions. It can be the real duration between the entry ant exit time, otherwise it can be a proporcional time to simplfy ( hour, half hour, three quarters of an hour...). The distribution of the sessions will be consistent with this duration.

allowed.description: Indicates if the section is available to assign.

buildings.title: Buildings
buildings.description: Contains the buildings of the school or education centre.

distances.title: Distances
distances.description: Distances in minutes to another building of the school.

refBuilding.description: Identifier name of the other building that refer the distance.

minutes.description: Distance minutes from the building from the referred building.

classRooms.title: ClassRooms
classRooms.description: Contains the rooms to put on the sessions.

capacity.description: Maximum students number who the classroom can accommodate.

frameTemplate.title: BannedFrameTemplate
frameTemplate.description: Templates with only banned sections of the frames.
frameTemplate.$comment: It is used when the element cannot have non preferred sections.

items.title: BannedSectionPreference
items.description: Template with only banned section assignment preference.

day.description: Day of the week when is located the section.

index.description: Index inside the day where is located the section.

refBuilding.description: Identifier name building where is located the classroom.

fullDay.description: Indicates if the classroom must be reserved all day after it have one assignment.

classRoomsSets.title: ClassRoomsSets
classRoomsSets.description: A divisions of classrooms, group by characteristics or organizational needs.

id.description: Identifier name of the ClassRooms group.

rooms.title: ClassRoomEntries
rooms.description: ClassRooms which it contains the group

anonymousRooms.description: Number of classrooms non-specific defined that it contains the group.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Types of tasks or activities for the teachers.

teachers.title: Teachers
teachers.description: Teacher object with personal data, preferences template and settings.

items.title: Teacher
items.description: Object with personal information and preferences from the teacher.

associationIdentifier.description: Group or association of teachers that should have similar of entry and out hours, if it is possible. It's useful for teachers that share transport.

generalSettings.title: GeneralSettings
generalSettings.description: Teacher's strict and ponderable conditions for the timetable. If there is not unique periods, these conditios are the default value, but they can be custom specified for each period in the 'periodSettings' tag.

periodSettings.title: PeriodsSettings
periodSettings.description: Teacher's strict and ponderable conditions,customized for each week/period

refPeriod.description: Identifier name of the period to which the settings affect.

subjects.title: Subjects
subjects.description: School subjects which are teach at sessions.

student-mentoring.description: Indicates if the subject is a tutorship.

refFrame.description: Identifier name of the group's frame.

numStudents.description: Number of students in the group.

freeAfternoons.description: Stric number of free afternoons for the group.

notGaps.description: Indicates If the group can have gaps in its timetable.

gapsAlwaysInNonPreferred.description: Indicates If the engine, for free intervals or gaps, to be in positions marked as non-preferred in the template.

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.description: Teachers sessions. These can be with students groups, meetings with other teachers or complementary activities.

refFrame.description: Identifier name of the session's frame.

refTasks.title: RefTasks
refTasks.description: List of task in the session.

refTeachers.title: RefTeachers
refTeachers.description: List of teachers who teach or interact in the session.

refSubjects.title: RefSubjects
refSubjects.description: List of subject's identifier which is teach at the session. At least one is required for teaching sessions with students groups.

refGroups.title: RefGroups
refGroups.description: List of group's identifier which is teach at the session. At least one is required for teaching sessions.

items.title: RefGroup
items.description: Pair of, reference id and number of students, values.

numStudents.description: Custom number of students who are in the sessions. If is not specified, the engine takes by default the value of the Group object.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: Contains information on how the classes of the session are distributed throughout the week. Only should contain one element between 'stablePeriods' and 'variablePeriods'.
distribution.$comment: Property 'periods' is required if there are more than one period in the timetable. Properties 'stablePeriods' and 'variablePeriods' are mutually exclusive.

periods.title: RefPeriods
periods.description: List of periods or weeks when the session must be assigned.

stablePeriods.title: StablePeriods
stablePeriods.description: The session's distribution is equals in each period.
stablePeriods.$comment: Only one property can be applied .

items.title: DailyMinutes
items.description: Indicates the minutes wich must have the session on the day.

variablePeriods.title: VariablePeriods
variablePeriods.description: The total of the classes of the distribution, are divided among the periods.

weeklyStable.$comment: It indicates a stable distribution (numbers of days and number of sections per asignation day), among all the periods between which it is distributed. It is not the distribution of each period, but the total of this session.

weeklyVariable.$comment: It indicates a variable distribution, among all the periods between which it is distributed. It is not the distribution of each period, but the total of this session.

maximunTimeInPeriod.description: Maximum of minutes to assign in each Period. If not defined, it is considered that there is no maximum limit.

minimnunTimeInPeriod.description: Minimum of minutes to assign in each Period.

sessionClassRooms.title: SessionClassRooms
sessionClassRooms.description: Contains the information about classrooms for the sessions. At least one classroom  is required for teaching sessions.

classRoomsToAssign.title: ClassRoomsToAssign
classRoomsToAssign.description: List of classrooms to the session. Each object in the list represent one classroom that should be assigned.

items.title: RefClassRoomToAssign
items.description: Object, with classrooms and/or set of classrooms, where the engine should take one of them for assign the session.

classRoomsList.title: ClassRoomRef
classRoomsList.description: Classroom's identifier name that could be assigned to session.

classRoomsSetsList.title: ClassRoomsSetsList
classRoomsSetsList.description: Identifier name of classroom set, where one classroom could be taken to assign to session.

capacityPreference.description: Preference about if the engine should evaluate the classroom capacity to assign the session.

capacityType.description: Indicates if all students of the sessions should fit on in each classroom, or in the amount of all classrooms.

refBuilding.description: Identifier name of the building where is session. Only allowed in sessions without groups os students. It is used to know transfer time and number of transfers between buildings for teachers without specfy a classroom.
refBuilding.$comment: It is incompatible with the other properties of object 'sessionClassRooms'.

frameTemplate.title: SessionFrameTemplate
frameTemplate.description: Templates with assignment preferences to section of the frames.

items.title: SessionSectionPreference
items.description: Template with a section assignment preference.

day.description: Day of the week when is located the section.

index.description: Index inside the day where is located the section.

type.description: Session availability to be assigned to the section.

sessionSettings.title: SessionSettings
sessionSettings.description: Conditions about the position of the session units.

computeForMaxMinOccupancy.description: Indicates if the session computes for teacher's daily maximum and minimum of occupancy. By default the engine computes sessions with students.
computeForMaxMinOccupancy.$comment: If session with students indicate false in this field, is ignored.

avoidFirstHourSessions.description: Penalize the position of the session if more than 50% of the classes are at first hour.

avoidLastHourSessions.description: Penalize the position of the session if more than 50% of the classes are at last hour.

avoidAssingLastHourAndFirstNextDay.description: Penalize that the last hour ande the first one of the following day coincide.

sameHourPreference.description: Preference about the session classes coincide in the same time slot.

avoidAfternoonSessions.description: Penalize if there are more than one session class after the midday.

avoidSectionsAfterBreak.description: Penalize if more than 50% of the classes are after the last break of the day.

nonBreakInTheMiddleOfSession.description: Do not allow breaks between classes of multiple duration (classes duration of more than one section).

followedDaysPreference.description: If the session has more than one class, it indicates the preference about assign them in consecutive days.

consecutiveWeeksBorders.description: Consider the end week day, and start week day, as consecutive days for 'followedDaysPreference'.

samePositionEveryPeriod.description: Keep the same position each week or period for the classes of the session.

sessionRelations.title: SessionRelations
sessionRelations.description: It contains the information on relationships between this and other sessions. These conditions only can apply for teaching sessions with students.

refSimultaneusGroup.title: RefSimultaneusGroup
refSimultaneusGroup.description: Identifier of the simultaneous sessions group of the session. Indicates that the sessions must be taught at same time as the sessions of the group.

differentDays.title: DifferentDays
differentDays.description: Conditions about this and other session can not coincide in the same day.

refSesions.title: RefSesions
refSesions.description: Identifiers of the sessions that they should not be assigned at the same day when this one.

daysSetting.description: Keep the same position each week or period for the classes of the session.

refConsecutiveGroup.title: RefConsecutiveGroup
refConsecutiveGroup.description: Identifier of the consecutive sessions group of the session. Indicates that the sessions must be taught consecutive to the sessions of the group.

nonConsecutiveSessions.title: NonConsecutiveSessions
nonConsecutiveSessions.description: Identifiers of the sessions that they should not be consecutive. It is a strict condition.

nonSimultaneus.title: NonSimultaneus
nonSimultaneus.description: Identifiers of the sessions that they should not be assigned at the same time. It is a strict condition.

previousTo.title: PreviousTo
previousTo.description: Indicates that this session should be assigned in a previous day to the sessions of the list. It is a strict condition.

afterTo.title: AfterTo
afterTo.description: Indicates that this session should be assigned in a later day to the sessions of the list. It is a strict condition.

maximumSeparationTo.title: MaximumSeparationTo
maximumSeparationTo.description: Contains sessions that must be taught a maximum number of days apart from the current session classes.

items.title: MaximumSeparationToSession
items.description: Contains the identifier of the session that must be taught a number of days apart, and the maximum days.

minimumSeparationTo.title: MinimumSeparationTo
minimumSeparationTo.description: Contains sessions that must be taught a minimun number of days apart from the current session classes.

items.title: MinimumSeparationToSession
items.description: Contains the identifier of the session that must be taught a number of days apart, and the minimun days.

days.description: Condition's Days of separation. If value is 0 or 1 is equivalent to 'DifferentDays' condition.

relationsList.title: RelationsList
relationsList.description: Contains relations list of consecutive sessions.

consecutiveGroups.title: ConsecutiveGroups
consecutiveGroups.description: List of groups of sessions that must be consecutive or on the same day.

items.title: ConsecutiveGroup
items.description: Contains the references of a continuous sessions group.

refSessions.title: SessionRefs
refSessions.description: Contains the references of a continuous sessions group.

order.description: Indicates if the sessions must be followed, separated, or it does not matter as long as they are assigned on the same day.

allowBreakBetweenSessions.description: Indicates if break between sessions is allowed to keep the relation .

onCallServices.title: OnCallServices
onCallServices.description: List of on call services of teachers defined in the timetable.

items.title: OnCallService
items.description: On call service of teachers who supervise the free time of students.
items.$comment: Property 'refPeriods' is required if there are more than one period in the timetable.

id.description: Identifier name of the On-Call service.

refFrame.description: Identifier name of the frame where will be set the service.

refPeriods.title: OnCallPeriodsInfo
refPeriods.description: Information about the periods that have the service and mirror placement in periods condition (same placement in periods).

periods.title: PeriodsList
periods.description: List of Periods that must have the service.

samePositionEveryPeriod.description: Keep the same position each week or period for the classes of the session.

refTask.description: Identifier name of the service's task.

inBreak.description: Indicates if it will be a break oversight service.

teachersEachSection.title: TeachersEachSection
teachersEachSection.description: Information about number of teacher in all sections.
teachersEachSection.$comment: 'byDefault' value will be used for all sections, if 'bySection' field is not informed. Also it value is used when one section is not informed at 'bySection'.

byDefault.description: Default value for number of teacher in all sections.

bySection.title: TeachersBySections
bySection.description: Custom number of teachers in each section.

items.title: TeachersBySection
items.description: Custom number of teachers in one timetable section.

numTeachers.description: Custom number of tachers for the section.

refTeachers.title: RefTeachers
refTeachers.description: List of teachers who make the service.

items.title: RefTeacher
items.description: Contains a teacher reference and it number of section oversight.

numOfSections.description: Number of sections of on-call service that the teacher must do weekly.

refBuilding.description: Identifier name of the building where is the service. It is used to know transfer time and number of transfers between buildings for teachers.

computeForMaxMinOccupancy.description: Indicates if the service computes for teacher's daily maximum and minimum of occupancy.

optimizationWeights.title: OptimizationWeights
optimizationWeights.description: Indicates the weights that the ponderable options will have for engine optimization process. The engine will apply default values for elements that did not specify.

timetableGaps.title: TimetableGaps
timetableGaps.description: Contains options related to timetable-gaps weights.

groupGaps.description: Indicates the weight that is assigned to the fact of leaving gaps in the group timetables.

teacherGaps.description: Indicates the weight that is assigned to the fact of leaving gaps in the teacher timetables.

nonPreferredPositions.title: NonPreferredPositionsOptimization
nonPreferredPositions.description: Contains options related to allocation in non-preferred sections.

inGroups.description: Indicates the weight to be placed in a non-preferential section of a group.

inTeachers.description: Indicates the weight to be placed in a non-preferential section of a teacher.

inSubjectsAndTask.description: Indicates the weight to be placed in a non-preferential section of a subject or a task.

inSessions.description: Indicates the weight to be placed in a non-preferential section of a session.

sessions.title: SessionsOptimization
sessions.description: Contains options related to optimizable conditions for sessions.

nonPreferredClassRoom.description: Indicates the weight of if class units are configured with a preferred classroom and with a group of alternative classrooms, it will be punished with the weight to be placed in one of the alternative classrooms.

samePositionEveryPeriod.description: Indicates the weight of placing the entities of a session that belongs to several periods in the same positions or not (it affects the on call services too).

consecutiveDays.description: Indicates the weight of the condition which it has been established in each case on the properties of each session, to be placed two or three class units, that is, all of them on consecutive days.

bordersTimetable.description: Indicates the weight of have assigned classes at the borders of the timetable.

afternoonOrAfterBreakClasses.description: Indicates the weight of penalization of have classes after the last break or in the afternoon.

sameHourSessionClasses.description: Indicates the weight of penalization of not fulfilling the preferred about assignment on consecutive days.

classRoomsChanges.description: Indicates the weight of all class units of each subject is not taught in the same classroom, and also to avoid changes in the classroom of groups. It means a change of classroom of a group only between consecutive intervals, not the ones divided by a break.

teachers.title: TeachersOptimization
teachers.description: Contains options related to optimizable conditions for teachers.

teacherIncompatibities.description: Indicates the weight for optimizable teacher's incompatibilities.

uniformDailyDistribution.description: Indicates the weight of placing the sessions of a teacher in a non-uniform way during the week.

excessContinuousTeaching.description: Indicates the weight of placing more continuous sessions than declared in its settings.

excessPermanence.description: Indicates the weight of assign more daily or weekly permanence than declared in its settings.

continuousSessionsWithGroup.description: Indicates the weight of having consecutive sessions taught to the same group.

onCallSectionsOnBorders.description: Indicates the weight of the teacher got assigned a on call service at the borders of his schedule, thus trying to fit them into the gaps of his class sessions.

teacherBalance.description: Indicates If the optimizer should balance the timetables of the different teachers, to avoid very bad schedules for a particular teacher.

countGapsAroundMidday.description: Indicates, in case of a split day (with midday break), that the unoccupied intervals between the morning and afternoon class units are counted. This option affect to ponderation at teacher optimization about gaps in it timetable.

conditionType.title: ConditionType
conditionType.description: Indicate if the incompatibility is a strict, avoid (ponderable for optimization) or ignore.

restrictionType.title: RestrictionType
restrictionType.description: Kind of 'dailyOcupation' restriction. It can be 'ignore', 'strict', 'preferred' or according to the related rule of optimization.

ocupationSetting.title: OcupationSettingType
ocupationSetting.description: Indicates whether the automatic calculation of the value must be adjusted to higher or lower. The adjustment is made with the duration of the greater section.

frameTemplate.title: FrameTemplate
frameTemplate.description: Templates with assignment preferences to section of the frames.

items.title: SectionPreference
items.description: Template with a section assignment preference.

day.description: Day of the week when is located the section.

index.description: Index inside the day where is located the section.

type.description: Element availability to be assigned to the section.

onCallServiceframeTemplate.title: OnCallTemplate
onCallServiceframeTemplate.description: Templates with teacher on-call assignment preferences.

items.title: OnCallSectionPreference
items.description: Template with a teacher section assignment preference about the service.

day.description: Day of the week when is located the section.

index.description: Index inside the day where is located the section.

type.description: Teacher availability to be assigned to the section.

weeklyStay.title: WeeklyStay
weeklyStay.description: Indicates the maximum teacher´s permanence time,  preferred  and strict , for the weekly stay that the teacher can be in the school.

strict.description: Strict time in minutes of maximum weekly stay.

preferable.description: Ponderable Time in minutes of maximum weeekly stay.

countAroundMidday.description: Indicates, in case of a split day, that the unoccupied intervals between the morning and afternoon class units are counted each day.

dailyStay.title: DailyStay
dailyStay.description: Indicates the maximum teacher´s permanence time,  preferred  and strict , for the daily stay that the teacher can be in the school.

strict.description: Strict time in minutes of maximum daily stay.

preferable.description: Ponderable Time in minutes of maximum daily stay.

countAroundMidday.description: Indicates, in case of a split day, that the unoccupied intervals between the morning and afternoon class units are counted.

avoidGapsBetweenSesions.description: Indicates if it should avoid free gaps between sessions for the teacher. It is a ponderable condition.
avoidGapsBetweenSesions.$comment: If did not specify, the engine will assign a true value.

maxContinuousTeaching.title: MaxContinuousTeaching
maxContinuousTeaching.description: Indicates the continuous maximum time teaching sessions, that are allowed without have a free gap or a non teaching session in between.

minutes.description: Maximum continuous teaching time in minutes.

minBreak.description: Minimum time gap to considered it as a break.
minBreak.$comment: If did not specify, the engine will assign the general value or default time of 30 minutes.

avoidClassesAroundBreak.description: Indicate if will penalize the existence of sessions on both sides of a recess guard taught by this teacher.

freeTimes.title: FreeTimes
freeTimes.description: Contains the free spaces of time that the teacher should have.

fullDay.title: FullDaysFreeTimes
fullDay.description: Teacher's full days of free time.

strictDays.description: Number of strict days when teacher should be free.

preferredDays.description: Number of preferred days when teacher should be free.

firstMinutes.title: FirstMinutesFreeTimes
firstMinutes.description: Teacher's free intervals at the beginning of the day.

strictDays.description: Number of strict days when teacher should have the free interval at the beginning of the day.

preferredDays.description: Number of preferred days when teacher should have the free interval at the beginning of the day.

minutes.description: Minutes of free time at the beginning of the day.

lastMinutes.title: LastMinutesFreeTimes
lastMinutes.description: Teacher's free intervals at the end of the day.

strictDays.description: Number of strict days when teacher should have the free interval at the end of the day.

preferredDays.description: Number of preferred days when teacher should have the free interval at the end of the day.

minutes.description: Minutes of free time at the end of the day.

consecutiveAnyTime.title: ConsecutiveAnyTimeFreeTimes
consecutiveAnyTime.description: Teacher's free intervals at any time of the day.

strictDays.description: Number of strict days when teacher should have the free interval.

preferredDays.description: Number of preferred days when teacher should have the free interval.

strict.description: Strict number of mornings off periods.

preferable.description: Preferable number of mornings off periods.

strict.description: Strict number of afternoons off periods.

preferable.description: Preferable number of afternoons off periods.

indistinctly.title: IndistinctlyFreePartTimes
indistinctly.description: Indistinctly, mornings or afternoons, off periods.

strict.description: Strict number of mornings or afternoons off periods.

preferable.description: Preferable number of mornings or afternoons off periods.

incompatibilities.title: Incompatibilities
incompatibilities.description: Contains teacher's incompatibilities about sessions assignation and rests times.

freeTimeBetweenDayBeforeAndCurrent.title: FreeTimeBetweenDays
freeTimeBetweenDayBeforeAndCurrent.description: Minutes between the departure and the next day's entry.

minutes.description: Custom time in minutes for incompatibility.

freeTimeBetweenEndWeekAndStartWeekDays.title: FreeTimeBetweenWeeksBorders
freeTimeBetweenEndWeekAndStartWeekDays.description: Minutes between finishing time on week's last day, and starting time the next week.

minutes.description: Custom time in minutes for incompatibility.

freeTimeFirstOrLastHoursDay.title: FreeTimeFirstOrLastHoursDay
freeTimeFirstOrLastHoursDay.description: Minutes of free time at first or last hours of the day.

minutes.description: Custom time in minutes for incompatibility.

doNotFinishAtLastAfternoonSectionIfStart.title: DoNotFinishAtLastAfternoonSection
doNotFinishAtLastAfternoonSectionIfStart.description: Do not finish at last hour in the afternoon and start at the first one.

doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfStarted.title: DoNotFinishAtLastMorningSection
doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfStarted.description: Do not start at first hour and and finish at the last hour of the morning.

doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfStartAt.title: DoNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfStartAtFirstAfternoon
doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfStartAt.description: Do not finish at the last hour in the morning and start at the first one in the afternoon.

doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfHasAfte.title: DoNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfHasAfternoon
doNotFinishAtLastMorningSectionIfHasAfte.description: Do not finish at the last hour in the morning and have the afternoon occupied.

doNotStartAtFirstMorningSectionIfHasAfte.title: DoNotStartAtFirstMorningSection
doNotStartAtFirstMorningSectionIfHasAfte.description: Do not start at the first hour and have occupation in the afternoon.

freeTimeAroundMidday.title: FreeTimeAroundMidday
freeTimeAroundMidday.description: Do not have less than a custom free time around noon pause.

minutes.description: Custom time in minutes for incompatibility.

dailyOcupation.title: DailyOcupation
dailyOcupation.description: Maximum and minimum values for teaching or activity time for teachers. This object indicates the kind of condition (estrict or ponderable) and if it should be adjusted the automatic calcultation in minutes at engine.

allowFreeDays.description: Indicates whether the check of the minimums is omitted in case of days without allocation. Prohibited days never are checked.

minimumTeaching.title: MinimumTeaching
minimumTeaching.description: Teacher's minimum time of teaching with students.

maximumTeaching.title: MaximumTeaching
maximumTeaching.description: Teacher's maximum time of teaching with students.

minimumOccupancy.title: MinimumOccupancy
minimumOccupancy.description: Teacher's minimum time of teaching with students and other non-teaching activities indicated as computable.

maximumOccupancy.title: MaximumOccupancy
maximumOccupancy.description: Teacher's maximum time of teaching with students and other non-teaching activities indicated as computable.

refFrame.description: Identifier name of a frame where the teacher take the midday. If it is not not specified, the engine will take the midday of the frame with the highest allocation.

strict.description: Indicates if the teacher's midday break must be respected without placing their sessions in sections of other frames that overlap with their midday.

dailyBuildingTransfers.title: DailyBuildingTransfers
dailyBuildingTransfers.description: Maximum number of transfers between buildings that can do the teacher per day.

strict.description: Strict maximum number of displacement per day.

preferable.description: Ponderable/preferable maximum number of displacement per day.

weeklyStable.title: WeeklyStable
weeklyStable.description: Contains a single possible weekly distribution.

items.title: DailyMinutes
items.description: Minutes that must have the session class on the day. Each value is a assignation day.

weeklyVariable.title: WeeklyVariable
weeklyVariable.description: Define the distribution as a number of sections per week and a maximum range of sections per day.

minDurationDaily.description: Indicates de preference about the session's classes of the minimum duration.

avoidMaxDuration.description: Indicates de preference about the session's classes of the maximum duration.

allowDiscontinuity.description: Indicates if discontinuous sections are allowed, that is, they have sections of other sessions or breaks in between.
